page.title: 05HOME LIFE
page.content: A Day In The Life Of Tracy Heather. Tuesday 8:15am,Tracy rises from her bed,dresses,washes and watches television. 8:45am her mother drives her to school. School begins at 9am. Her lessons include assembly, english, music, maths, enviromental studies and french.For dinner she eats, pork, potatoes and pineapple pie.School ends at 4pm.Tracy is picked up and driven to her music lesson.Tracy goes to her father's office and arrives home at 5:30pm.For tea she eats Kentucky Nuggets and stays in for the night and watches television.At 10:30pm she undresses and gets into bed and reads magazines and Sweet Dream books. The magazine that she reads is called Just Seventeen. After a while Tracy gets tired and goes to sleep. Kathryn Hardaker Aged 13.
